sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-control', templateUrl: './control.component.html', styleUrls: ['./control.component.css'], }) export class ControlComponent { switchVentilador = false; switchLuz = false; switchDes = false; toggleSwitch(num: number) { if (num === 1) this.switchVentilador = !this.switchVentilador; if (num === 2) this.switchLuz = !this.switchLuz; if (num === 3) this.switchDes = !this.switchDes; } }

Control de humedad

Controles del sistema

Ventilador
Luz UV
Deshuimidificador
